tool.name: MFAssignR FindRecalSeries
tool.description: Selects most suitable series for recalibration

configfiles.configfile:
df <- read.table("$input_file", header=TRUE, sep="\t") result <- MFAssignR::find_series( df = df, global_min = $global_min, global_max = $global_max, number_of_combinations = $number_of_combinations, abundance_score_threshold = $abundance_score_threshold, peak_distance_threshold = $peak_distance_threshold, coverage_threshold = $coverage_threshold, fill_series = $fill_series )
write.table(final_series, file="$final_series", sep="\t", row.names=FALSE)
